
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
 long long int p,n;
 int pr,test,k=1;
 scanf("%d",&test);
 do
 {
  pr=0;
  p=1;
  scanf("%lld",&n);
  for(p=1;p<=n;p=p*2)
  {
   if(p==n)
   {
    pr=1;
   break;
   }
   else
   continue;
  }
  if(pr==1)
  printf("No\n");
  else
  printf("Yes\n");
  k++;
 }
 while(k<=test);
 return 0;
 }
